title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 11, 2020
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 11, 2020 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Python
items.content_text:
### DevOps Tools

*   SSH-style Deployment
    *   [cuisine (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/sebastien/cuisine) - Chef-like functionality for Fabric.
    *   [fabric (⭐15k)](https://github.com/fabric/fabric) - A simple, Pythonic tool for remote execution and deployment.
*   Monitoring
    *   [psutil (⭐11k)](https://github.com/giampaolo/psutil) - A cross-platform process and system utilities module.
items.content_html:
DevOps Tools

  • SSH-style Deployment
    • cuisine (⭐1.3k) - Chef-like functionality for Fabric.
    • fabric (⭐15k) - A simple, Pythonic tool for remote execution and deployment.
  • Monitoring
    • psutil (⭐11k) - A cross-platform process and system utilities module.

items.title: Awesome Cmake
items.content_text:
### Examples / Templates

*   [ModernCppStarter (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/TheLartians/ModernCppStarter) - A template for modern C++ projects using CMake, CI, code coverage, clang-format, reproducible dependency management, tests using [doctest (⭐6.3k)](https://github.com/onqtam/doctest) and much more. [`[UNLICENSE]`](https://unlicense.org/)
items.content_html:
Examples / Templates

  • ModernCppStarter (⭐4.9k) - A template for modern C++ projects using CMake, CI, code coverage, clang-format, reproducible dependency management, tests using doctest (⭐6.3k) and much more. [UNLICENSE]

items.title: Awesome Django
items.content_text:
### Projects / Boilerplate

*   [django-docker-heroku-template (⭐36)](https://github.com/bfirsh/django-docker-heroku-template) - A template with Docker, GitHub Actions, and Heroku set up for dev/test/prod, plus various other best practices.
items.content_html:
Projects / Boilerplate

  • django-docker-heroku-template (⭐36) - A template with Docker, GitHub Actions, and Heroku set up for dev/test/prod, plus various other best practices.

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### Tools & Utilities / Others

*   [Blazor Highcharts (⭐33)](https://github.com/Allegiance-Consulting/blazor-highcharts) - ![last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/Allegiance-Consulting/blazor-highcharts?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=86400) A port of the popular Highcharts library. [Demo](https://allegiance-consulting.github.io/blazor-highcharts/).
items.content_html:
Tools & Utilities / Others

items.title: Awesome Keycloak
items.content_text:
### Articles

*   [How to add a custom field to the Keycloak registration page](https://keycloakthemes.com/blog/how-to-add-custom-field-keycloak-registration-page)
*   [How to setup Sign in with Google using Keycloak](https://keycloakthemes.com/blog/how-to-setup-sign-in-with-google-using-keycloak)
*   [How to sign in users on Keycloak using Github](https://keycloakthemes.com/blog/how-to-sign-in-users-on-keycloak-using-github)

### Tools

*   [louketo-proxy (FKA Gatekeeper) (⭐947)](https://github.com/louketo/louketo-proxy)
items.content_html:

  • How to setup Sign in with Google using Keycloak

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

*   [moOde Audio](https://moodeaudio.org/) - Audiophile-quality music playback for the wonderful Raspberry Pi family of single board computers. ([Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/moode-player/moode)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP`
items.content_html:
